data.title: Harris County, Texas Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Harris County, Texas with information about Harris County, Texas time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Harris County, Texas is in the Central Time Zone

The Current Time in

Harris County, Texas is:

Thursday

8/15/2024

2:54 AM

CDT

Harris County, Texas

is in the

Central Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Central Standard Time - is abbreviated as CST

Central Daylight Time - is abbreviated as CDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Harris County, Texas is GMT/UTC - 6h during Standard Time

Harris County, Texas is GMT/UTC - 5h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Harris County, Texas starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
